postScript:
:SET &RID# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*EXITCODE=*")
:PROCESS &RID#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&RID#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &EXITCODE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &EXITCODE# = ADD(&EXITCODE#,1)
:  SET &EXITCODE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&EXITCODE#)
:  PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
!:  IF &EXITCODE# > 0
!:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800
!:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

! CSR FILE
:SET &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*CSRFILE=*")
:PROCESS &HND1#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &CSR_FILE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &CSR_FILE# = ADD(&CSR_FILE#,1)
:  SET &CSR_FILE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&CSR_FILE#)
:  IF &CSR_FILE# <> ""
:    PUBLISH &CSR_FILE#,,TOP
:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS


! KEY FILE
:SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*KEYFILE=*")
:PROCESS &HND2#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &KEY_FILE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &KEY_FILE# = ADD(&KEY_FILE#,1)
:  SET &KEY_FILE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&KEY_FILE#)
:  IF &KEY_FILE# <> ""
:    PUBLISH &KEY_FILE#,,TOP
:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS


! PEM FILE
:SET &HND3# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*PEMFILE=*")
:PROCESS &HND3#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND3#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &PEM_FILE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &PEM_FILE# = ADD(&PEM_FILE#,1)
:  SET &PEM_FILE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&PEM_FILE#)
:  IF &PEM_FILE# <> ""
:    PUBLISH &PEM_FILE#,,TOP
:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

! KEYSTORE FILE
:SET &HND4# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*KEYSTOREFILE=*")
:PROCESS &HND4#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND4#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &KEYSTORE_FILE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &KEYSTORE_FILE# = ADD(&KEYSTORE_FILE#,1)
:  SET &KEYSTORE_FILE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&KEYSTORE_FILE#)
:  IF &KEYSTORE_FILE# <> ""
:    PUBLISH &KEYSTORE_FILE#,,TOP
:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

! APPID
:SET &HND5# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*APPID=*")
:PROCESS &HND5#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND5#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &APP_ID# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &APP_ID# = ADD(&APP_ID#,1)
:  SET &APP_ID# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&APP_ID#)
:  IF &APP_ID# <> ""
:    PUBLISH &APP_ID#,,TOP
:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS
preScript:
:DEFINE &IAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &OAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3

:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB('${IN_AGENT#}', '[','')
:PRINT &TMP#
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, ']','')
:PRINT &TMP#
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, '"','')
:PRINT &TMP#

:FILL &IAGENTS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TMP#,",")
:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&IAGENTS#[])

:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&IAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#],".")
:  SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:  SET &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#] = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = SYS_HOST_ALIVE(&OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#])
:  PRINT "Agent &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#], Alive: &AGENT_ALIVE#"
:  IF &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:    SET &AGENT# = &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#]
:    PUB &AGENT#
:    SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN# + 1
:  ENDIF
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

!:SET &LOGIN# = &IN_LOGIN#
!:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB

:DEFINE &APAGENT#,string,2
:SET &DATE# = SYS_DATE("YYYYMMDD",&TZ#)
:SET &TIME# = SYS_TIME("HHMMSS",&TZ#)

:FILL &APAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&AGENT#,".")
:SET &PAGENT# = STR_LC("&APAGENT#[1]")

:SET &TMP1# = "${IN_PARAMETERS#}"
:IF &TMP1# <> ""
:SET &XPARAMETERS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&TMP1#, "%DATE%", &DATE#)
:SET &XPARAMETERS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&XPARAMETERS#, "%TIME%", &TIME#)
:SET &XPARAMETERS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&XPARAMETERS#, "%AGENT%", &PAGENT#)
:PUB &XPARAMETERS#
:ENDIF

processingCommand.script:
echo ">> Server: ${SERVER_NAME#}"
echo ">> Hostname: `hostname`"
echo ">> Shell: $SHELL"
echo ">> Username: `whoami`"
echo ">> Parameters: ${XPARAMETERS#}"
echo ">> Executing: ${IN_SCRIPT_NAME#} ${XPARAMETERS#}"
echo ">> Script output: "
${IN_SCRIPT_NAME#} ${XPARAMETERS#}
EXITCODE=$?
if [[ $EXITCODE -eq 2 ]]; then
  EXITCODE=0
  echo ">> Warning: Script exited with exitcode 2!"
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
else
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
fi
exit $EXITCODE
